channel.title: black on Richard Si
channel.description: Recent content in black on Richard Si

item.title: What's new in Black 23.1.0
item.description: Black 23.1.0 introduces an updated stable style, improved inference of the default target version(s), and other QOL improvements.

item.title: Black 23.1a1 - please help us test the 2023 stable style!
item.description: We just released Black 23.1a1 with the first draft of the 2023 stable style, please try it out and let us know your feedback and concerns.

item.title: What's new in Black 22.10.0
item.description: Black 22.10.0 removes runtime support for Python 3.6, fixes a major fmt: off/on bug, and other QOL improvements.

item.title: Compiling Black with mypyc, Pt. 3 - Deployment
item.description: mypyc can compile Black and provide respectable performance gains, let's deploy it in production!

item.title: Compiling Black with mypyc, Pt. 2 - Optimization
item.description: Compiling Black without errors or warnings was the easy bit, now I had to optimize it for mypyc.

item.title: Compiling Black with mypyc, Pt. 1 - Initial Steps
item.description: I spent a COVID summer (and then some) integrating mypyc into Black to double performance. How was it?
